title: Powers of director of labor and industrial relations
context: §132-15 Powers of director of labor and industrial relations. Nothing contained in this chapter shall be construed to deprive the director of labor and industrial relations of any power or jurisdiction over or relative to the storage of explosives. [L 1917, c 115, pt of §49; RL 1925, pt of §3463; RL 1935, pt of §6839; am L 1939, c 239, §1(17); RL 1945, §8540; RL 1955, §184-17; HRS §132-17; am and ren L 1978, c 241, §2(18)]
